verses.verse: And as they <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to the <S%G2992>people,<s%> the <S%G2409>priests,<s%> and the <S%G4755>captain<s%> of the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> and the <S%G4523>Sadducees,<s%> <S%G2186>came<s%> on them,

Being <S%G1278>grieved<s%> that they <S%G1321>taught<s%> the <S%G2992>people,<s%> and <S%G2605>preached<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>
And they <S%G1911>laid<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> on them, and <S%G5087>put<s%> them in <S%G5084>hold<s%> to the <S%G839>next<s%> <S%G839>day:<s%> for it was <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G2073>eventide.<s%>

However, <S%G4183>many<s%> of them which <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G4100>believed;<s%> and the <S%G706>number<s%> of the <S%G435>men<s%> was <S%G5616>about<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G5505>thousand.<s%>
And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G839>morrow,<s%> that their <S%G758>rulers,<s%> and <S%G4245>elders,<s%> and <S%G1122>scribes,<s%>

And <S%G452>Annas<s%> the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest,<s%> and <S%G2533>Caiaphas,<s%> and <S%G2491>John,<s%> and <S%G223>Alexander,<s%> and as <S%G3745>many<s%> as were of the <S%G1085>kindred<s%> of the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G748>priest,<s%> were <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>

And when they had <S%G2476>set<s%> them in the <S%G3319>middle,<s%> they <S%G4441>asked,<s%> By <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1411>power,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> by <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G3686>name,<s%> have you <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G5124>this?<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G4130>filled<s%> with the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, You <S%G758>rulers<s%> of the <S%G2992>people,<s%> and <S%G4245>elders<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> we <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G4594>day<s%> be <S%G350>examined<s%> of the <S%G2108>good<s%> <S%G2108>deed<s%> done to the <S%G772>weak<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> by <S%G5101>what<s%> means he is <S%G4982>made<s%> <S%G4982>whole;<s%>

Be it <S%G1110>known<s%> to you <S%G3956>all,<s%> and to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> that by the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> of <S%G3478>Nazareth,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G4717>crucified,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> even by him does <S%G3778>this<s%> man <S%G3936>stand<s%> <S%G3936>here<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> you <S%G5199>whole.<s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> is the <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G1848>set<s%> <S%G1848>at<s%> <S%G1848>nothing<s%> of you <S%G3618>builders,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G2776>head<s%> of the <S%G1137>corner.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when they <S%G2334>saw<s%> the <S%G3954>boldness<s%> of <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2491>John,<s%> and <S%G2638>perceived<s%> that they were <S%G62>unlearned<s%> and <S%G2399>ignorant<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> they <S%G2296>marveled;<s%> and they <S%G1921>took<s%> <S%G1921>knowledge<s%> of them, that they had <S%G2258>been<s%> with <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
And <S%G991>beholding<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%> which was <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> with them, they <S%G2192>could<s%> <S%G471>say<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G471>against<s%> it.
But when they had <S%G2753>commanded<s%> them to <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G565>aside<s%> out of the <S%G4892>council,<s%> they <S%G4820>conferred<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G240>themselves,<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> shall we <S%G4160>do<s%> to <S%G5125>these<s%> <S%G444>men?<s%> for that <S%G3303>indeed<s%> a <S%G1110>notable<s%> <S%G4592>miracle<s%> has been <S%G1096>done<s%> by them is <S%G5319>manifest<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> them that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> in <S%G2419>Jerusalem;<s%> and we <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G720>deny<s%> it.

But that it <S%G1268>spread<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1909>further<s%> <S%G4118><s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> the <S%G2992>people,<s%> let us <S%G547>straightly<s%> <S%G546>threaten<s%> them, that they <S%G2980>speak<s%> from now <S%G3371>on<s%> to <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> in <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3686>name.<s%>

And they <S%G2564>called<s%> them, and <S%G3853>commanded<s%> them not to <S%G5350>speak<s%> <S%G2527>at<s%> <S%G2527>all<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

But <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G1487>Whether<s%> it be <S%G1342>right<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G191>listen<s%> to you <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> you.
For we <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> but <S%G2980>speak<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G1492>seen<s%> and <S%G191>heard.<s%>

<S%G1161>So<s%> when they had further <S%G4324>threatened<s%> them, they let them <S%G630>go,<s%> <S%G2147>finding<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> they might <S%G2849>punish<s%> them, <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G2992>people:<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> men <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> for that which was <S%G1096>done.<s%>

For the <S%G444>man<s%> was <S%G4119>above<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> old, <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4592>miracle<s%> of <S%G2392>healing<s%> was <S%G1096>showed.<s%>

And being let <S%G630>go,<s%> they <S%G2064>went<s%> to their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2398>company,<s%> and <S%G518>reported<s%> <S%G3745>all<s%> that the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G4245>elders<s%> had <S%G2036>said<s%> to them.

And when they <S%G191>heard<s%> that, they <S%G142>lifted<s%> up their <S%G5456>voice<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> with <S%G3661>one<s%> <S%G3661>accord,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1203>Lord,<s%> you are <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> have <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> that in them is:

<S%G3588>Who<s%> by the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of your <S%G3816>servant<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> have <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2444>Why<s%> did the <S%G1484>heathen<s%> <S%G5433>rage,<s%> and the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3191>imagine<s%> <S%G2756>vain<s%> things?

The <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G3936>stood<s%> up, and the <S%G758>rulers<s%> were <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G1909>together<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and <S%G2596>against<s%> his <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

For of a <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> your <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G3816>child<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you have <S%G5548>anointed,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G2264>Herod,<s%> and <S%G4194>Pontius<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate,<s%> with the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> and the <S%G2992>people<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> were <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G4863>together,<s%>
For to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> your <S%G5495>hand<s%> and your <S%G1012>counsel<s%> <S%G4309>determined<s%> <S%G4309>before<s%> to be <S%G1096>done.<s%>

And <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1896>behold<s%> their <S%G547>threatenings:<s%> and <S%G1325>grant<s%> to your <S%G1401>servants,<s%> that with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3954>boldness<s%> they may <S%G2980>speak<s%> your <S%G3056>word,<s%>

By <S%G1614>stretching<s%> <S%G1614>forth<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> to <S%G2392>heal;<s%> and that <S%G4592>signs<s%> and <S%G5059>wonders<s%> may be <S%G1096>done<s%> by the <S%G3686>name<s%> of your <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G3816>child<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And when they had <S%G1189>prayed,<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> was <S%G4531>shaken<s%> <S%G1722>where<s%> <S%G3739><s%> they were <S%G4863>assembled<s%> <S%G4863>together;<s%> and they were <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G4130>filled<s%> with the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%> and they <S%G2980>spoke<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> with <S%G3954>boldness.<s%>

And the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of them that <S%G4100>believed<s%> were of one <S%G2588>heart<s%> and of <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G5590>soul:<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G1520>any<s%> of them that <S%G5100>ought<s%> of the things which he <S%G5224>possessed<s%> was his <S%G2398>own;<s%> but they <S%G1510>had<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> things <S%G2839>common.<s%>

And with <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G591>gave<s%> the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G3142>witness<s%> of the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%> and <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> was on them <S%G3956>all.<s%>

<S%G3761>Neither<s%> was there <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> them that <S%G1729>lacked:<s%> for as <S%G3745>many<s%> as were <S%G2935>possessors<s%> of <S%G5564>lands<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3614>houses<s%> <S%G4453>sold<s%> them, and <S%G5342>brought<s%> the <S%G5092>prices<s%> of the things that were <S%G4097>sold,<s%>

And <S%G5087>laid<s%> them down <S%G3844>at<s%> the <S%G652>apostles'<s%> <S%G4228>feet:<s%> and <S%G1239>distribution<s%> was <S%G1239>made<s%> to <S%G1538>every<s%> man <S%G2530>according<s%> as he <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G5532>need.<s%>

And <S%G2500>Joses,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> by the <S%G652>apostles<s%> was <S%G1941>surnamed<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas,<s%> <S%G3739>(which<s%> is, being <S%G3177>interpreted,<s%> The <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G3874>consolation,<s%>) a <S%G3019>Levite,<s%> and of the <S%G1085>country<s%> of <S%G2954>Cyprus,<s%>
